review:
Good Morning Doctor,
I P.Nagaraja from Kadapa, I had visited the doctor on 08th Nov-23, there was severe pain in the left side of my teeth  I was unable to eat & speak properly, the doctor saw my details completely and prescribed a few medicines, and did a teeth extraction on my left side and removed 4 teeths Now I am in good ****** ** ****** he listens and speaks very softly to patients cares of his patient.
Grateful to you doctor************** ******** ** *********

I visited to doctor on 14th june-21,  There was wound on my gum severely, 
blood clotting was there in my mouth, i was not able to eat & speak properly,
doctor saw my details completely , and prescribed few medicines , Doctor is really great, he listens and speak very softly to patient.  ** ** *** *** **** ****** * *** really cares of his patient.
Grateful to you doctor

Regards,
Niteesh Mishra
L&T
I had injury over my face after an accident and full face was swollen. Was treated by this nice doctor when admitted at hospital. He did surgery and took lot of care till I became normal.
Went to doctor for face injury after accident. Fast treatment and everything normal within a week. Surgery done without any scar on face.

context: Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery,Reconstructive surgery of the face,Mid Face Fracture Repair,Maxillo Facial Treatment,ORIF,
review: Was treated by Dr. Visakan after bike accident. Whole family was depressed because of many face bone and skull fracture. In spite of COVID-19 lock down, doctor did procedure and completed treatment. We are thankful.

context: Reconstructive surgery of the face,Dental Surgery,Maxillo Facial Treatment,Maxilla Fracture Treatment,Mandible fracture Repair,
review: I had second accident and was unconscious for long time. Doctor told my family I will become normal and go back to work. He operated on my face, One night I had difficulty in breathing, doctor came immediately. I got well and better now.

context: Mandible fracture Repair,Facial Fracture Treatment,Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery,
review: Suffered major accident one evening and thought my future was a problem. thanks to friend, they told me about this doctor and as said, he took care of me very well and iam back to normal diet now.
